title: Kubernetes Pods CrashLoopBackOff Troubleshooting
content: If pods are CrashLoopBackOff: check logs, describe pod, verify env vars/secrets, check image pull, check liveness/readiness probes, and confirm resource limits.

title: High Latency in API Service
content: Investigate high p95 latency: check APM traces, DB slow queries, upstream timeouts, CPU throttling, GC pauses, and network saturation.

title: Database Connection Pool Exhaustion
content: If connection pool is exhausted: validate max pool size, detect connection leaks, review query timeouts, scale DB, and add circuit breakers.

title: Node Disk Pressure in Kubernetes
content: DiskPressure: check /var/lib/containerd, prune unused images, rotate logs, review ephemeral storage requests/limits, and increase node disk size.

title: TLS Certificate Expiry Monitoring
content: Track TLS expiry: set alerts for 30/14/7 days, validate renew automation, test cert chain, and ensure reload without downtime.
